Key Match Events: Harry Kane gave England the lead before Southgate’s side dropped off with Denmark hitting back to secure a point in Frankfurt
Morten Hjulmand fired in a powerful low shot from long distance to level the score in the 34th minute
England wilted in the second-half, with Denmark making them look ragged in attack
Pre-Game Insights: England has four points from two games, after edging past Serbia 1-0 in its first match
That points tally always has been enough to advance in the 24-team Euros format
Still, England can finish in any position from first to third in the Group C standings after playing unbeaten Slovenia next Tuesday
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate admitted underperforming England are struggling to cope with the pressure after the Euro 2024 hopefuls were booed at the end of a dismal draw with Denmark
Harry Kane admits England are “struggling” at Euro 2024 after they were jeered off the pitch following a laboured draw against Denmark
Ben Stokes hit out at “negative pundits” after England’s drab draw against Denmark at Euro 2024 in Frankfurt
Miscellaneous Highlights: Frankfurt pitch cuts up to cause players problems after Walker injury scare
England fans slam ‘disgrace of a pitch’ as injury risk at Euro 2024 game against Denmark
Others: Gary Neville highlights the problem with Declan Rice for England after looking “nervous” in England’s draw against Denmark at Euro 2024
Alan Shearer and the BBC pundits were scathing of Gareth Southgate’s set-up
The midfield experiment’: Are pundits right to be so critical of England midfield?
